fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Transport, Climate Action, European Neighbourhood Policy
eu_initiatives:
Marine and maritime legislation (MSFD, MSP, NATURA 2000, WFD) 
Maritime and coastal policies (Integrated maritime policy, Blue Growth) 
Energy (REN) 
ENP/CBC (Mediterranean, Black Sea)
source: EMFF/DG MARE, DG NEAR, DG ENV
goals__remit:
SML supports public and private organizations in designing and implementing integrated maritime and coastal policies and strategies, and in developing Blue Economy projects with integrated approach.  
Main fields and topics: policy making, strategy building, governance, maritime surveillance, evaluation, marine renewable energy
